familyMemberEthics.description: Former president of TNGC Pine Hill LLC (F/K/A Crest Court LLC) (Trump National Golf Club - Philadelphia), in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $4,377,111 in golf related revenue income from TRUMP NATIONAL GOLF CLUB - PHILADELPHIA, valued at $5,000,001 - $25,000,000. Underlying Assets: golf club. Location: Pine Hill, NJ. See attached schedule.
familyMemberEthics.business: TNGC Pine Hill LLC (F/K/A Crest Court LLC) (Trump National Golf Club - Philadelphia)

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president/chairman/director of TNGC Pine Hill Member Corp. (F/K/A Crest Court Member Court), in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
